00057 BOOLEAN EnterMercsNoAccount()
00058 {
00059   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00060 
00061       InitMercBackGround();
00062 
00063       // load the Account box graphic and add it
00064       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00065       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\NoAccountBox.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00066       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiNoAccountImage));
00067 
00068 
00069       // Open Accouint button
00070       guiOpenAccountBoxButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\BigButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00071 
00072       guiOpenAccountBoxButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiOpenAccountBoxButtonImage, MercNoAccountText[MERC_NO_ACC_OPEN_ACCOUNT],
00073                                                                                FONT12ARIAL, 
00074                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_UP_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00075                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_DOWN_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00076                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00077                                                                                MERC_OPEN_BUTTON_X, MERC_OPEN_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00078                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnOpenAccountBoxButtonCallback);
00079       SetButtonCursor(guiOpenAccountBoxButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00080       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiOpenAccountBoxButton, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED);
00081 
00082 
00083       guiCancelBoxButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiOpenAccountBoxButtonImage, MercNoAccountText[MERC_NO_ACC_CANCEL],
00084                                                                                FONT12ARIAL, 
00085                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_UP_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00086                                                                                MERC_BUTTON_DOWN_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00087                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00088                                                                                MERC_CANCEL_BUTTON_X, MERC_CANCEL_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00089                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnCancelBoxButtonCallback);
00090       SetButtonCursor(guiCancelBoxButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00091       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiCancelBoxButton, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED);
00092 
00093       RenderMercsNoAccount();
00094 
00095       return(TRUE);
00096 }
00097 
00098 void ExitMercsNoAccount()
00099 {
00100       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiNoAccountImage);
00101 
00102       UnloadButtonImage( guiOpenAccountBoxButtonImage );
00103       RemoveButton( guiOpenAccountBoxButton );
00104       RemoveButton( guiCancelBoxButton );
00105 
00106       RemoveMercBackGround();
00107 }

00114 void RenderMercsNoAccount()
00115 {
00116   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00117 
00118       DrawMecBackGround();
00119 
00120       // Title
00121       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiNoAccountImage);
00122       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,MERC_NO_ACCOUNT_IMAGE_X, MERC_NO_ACCOUNT_IMAGE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00123 
00124       //Display the sentence
00125       DisplayWrappedString(MERC_NA_SENTENCE_X, MERC_NA_SENTENCE_Y, MERC_NA_SENTENCE_WIDTH, 2, MERC_NA_TEXT_FONT, MERC_NA_TEXT_COLOR, MercNoAccountText[MERC_NO_ACC_NO_ACCOUNT_OPEN_ONE], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00126 
00127   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00128       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00129   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00130 }

00133 void BtnOpenAccountBoxButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00134 {
00135       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00136       {
00137             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00138             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00139       }
00140 
00141       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00142       {
00143             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00144             {
00145                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00146 
00147                   //open an account
00148                   LaptopSaveInfo.gubPlayersMercAccountStatus = MERC_ACCOUNT_VALID;
00149 
00150                   //Get an account number
00151                   LaptopSaveInfo.guiPlayersMercAccountNumber = Random( 99999 );
00152 
00153                   gusMercVideoSpeckSpeech = SPECK_QUOTE_THANK_PLAYER_FOR_OPENING_ACCOUNT;
00154 
00155                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC;
00156                   gubArrivedFromMercSubSite = MERC_CAME_FROM_ACCOUNTS_PAGE;
00157 
00158                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00159             }
00160       }
00161       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00162       {
00163             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00164             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00165       }
00166 } 
00167 
00168 
00169 void BtnCancelBoxButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00170 {
00171       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00172       {
00173             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00174             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00175       }
00176       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00177       {
00178             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00179             {
00180                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00181 
00182                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC;
00183                   gubArrivedFromMercSubSite = MERC_CAME_FROM_ACCOUNTS_PAGE;
00184 
00185                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00186             }
00187       }
00188       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00189       {
00190             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00191             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00192       }
00193 }
